contents: Article 4 (Properties) ① The foundation's assets are divided into basic assets and ordinary assets. ② The following assets are considered basic assets, and other assets are considered ordinary assets. Revised 2020. 11. 5. 1. Property contributed by the government as basic property, 2. Property acquired free of charge through donation or otherwise. However, the funds contributed by the donor for the purpose of use are considered ordinary property. 3. Other property that the Board of Directors has decided to incorporate as basic property. ③ The basic property at the time of establishment is as shown in Appendix List 1. Revised on December 16, 2015, ④ The current basic assets are as shown in Appendix List 2. Newly established 2015. 12. 16.
